title: New Funding Alert
description: AIT Lab got awarded a MnDOT project 'Refining the Understanding of Parking Space Requirements and Its Impact on Vehicle Miles Travelled.' TXST Budget: $50,000. TXST will work with Michigan State University (MSU) as a sub-contractor! PI: Kakan Dey, Co-PI: Subasish Das.

title: New Funding Alert
description: AIT Lab is awarded with 'NCHRP Synthesis 20-05/Topic 56-05: Traffic Analysis Practices for Non-Motorized Modes (Vulnerable Road Users).' Budget: $55,000. PI: Subasish Das.

title: New Funding Alert
description: AIT Lab got awarded 'NCHRP 17-134: Center Line Buffer Areas for Safety: Implementation Guidelines and Tool.' Budget: $250,000. TTI will work as a sub-contractor! PI: Subasish Das, Co-PI: Srinivas Geedipally.

title: Student Achievement
description: Big congratulations to Mahmuda Sultana Mimi for being selected as a 2025 Eno Fellow — a prestigious national honor awarded to the top MS/PhD students in transportation across the U.S.! Mimi’s passion, leadership, and dedication to shaping the future of transportation have earned her a spot among an elite cohort of future leaders.

title: Student Achievement
description: Darrell Anderson has been awarded a $1,160 URF grant for a project: Case Study: Ensuring Walkability in San Marcos, TX Using Machine Learning and GIS to Assess the Feasibility of the 15-Minute City Concept. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Biplov Pandey has been awarded a $2,000 URF grant for a project: Enhancing Grid Resilience by Incorporating Sustainable EV Charging Networks in Texas. Congrats!

title: Student Achievement
description: Gaurab Chhetri has been awarded a $2,000 URF grant for a project: Integrating AI and IoT Technologies for Heat Stress Prediction in Solar Energy Facilities Using Synthetic Data. Congrats!
